channel.title: Aggressive NPC's
channel.description:
Well currently I am creating a new type of mini-game. Well The NPC's will spawn as in SummonNewNPC, but the only problem there is.. is that they are not aggressive to the player. Keep in mind, that this is a multi zone so that an NPC could lets say attack a player then after the player dies the NPC will switch over and attack a different player..
thanks, Lkc

item.title: Aggressive NPC's
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Well currently I am creating a new type of mini-game.
Well The NPC’s will spawn as in SummonNewNPC, but the only problem there is… is that they are not aggressive to the player.
Keep in mind, that this is a multi zone so that an NPC could lets say attack a player then after the player dies the NPC will switch over and attack a different player…

thanks,
Lkc
